32#include <cstdlib>
33#include <cstddef>
34
35#include <QtCore/QDir>
36#include <QtCore/QByteArray>
37#include <QtCore/QDataStream>
38#include <QtCore/QCryptographicHash>
39#include <QtNetwork/QLocalServer>
40#include <QtNetwork/QLocalSocket>
41
42#include "singleapplication.h"
43#include "singleapplication_p.h"
44
45#ifdef Q_OS_UNIX
46 #include <unistd.h>
47 #include <sys/types.h>
48 #include <pwd.h>
49#endif
50
51#ifdef Q_OS_WIN
52 #include <windows.h>
53 #include <lmcons.h>
54#endif
55
56SingleApplicationPrivate::SingleApplicationPrivate( SingleApplication *q_ptr )
57 : q_ptr( q_ptr )
58{
59 server = nullptr;
60 socket = nullptr;
61 memory = nullptr;
62 instanceNumber = -1;
63}
64
65SingleApplicationPrivate::~SingleApplicationPrivate()
66{
67 if( socket != nullptr ) {
68 socket->close();
69 delete socket;
70 }
71
72 if( memory != nullptr ) {
73 memory->lock();
74 auto *inst = static_cast<InstancesInfo*>(memory->data());
75 if( server != nullptr ) {
76 server->close();
77 delete server;
78 inst->primary = false;
79 inst->primaryPid = -1;
80 inst->primaryUser[0] = '\0';
81 inst->checksum = blockChecksum();
82 }
83 memory->unlock();
84
85 delete memory;
86 }
87}
88
89QString SingleApplicationPrivate::getUsername()
90{
91#ifdef Q_OS_WIN
92 wchar_t username[UNLEN + 1];
93 // Specifies size of the buffer on input
94 DWORD usernameLength = UNLEN + 1;
95 if( GetUserNameW( username, &usernameLength ) )
96 return QString::fromWCharArray( username );
97#if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(5, 10, 0)
98 return QString::fromLocal8Bit( qgetenv( "USERNAME" ) );
99#else
100 return qEnvironmentVariable( "USERNAME" );
101#endif
102#endif
103#ifdef Q_OS_UNIX
104 QString username;
105 uid_t uid = geteuid();
106 struct passwd *pw = getpwuid( uid );
107 if( pw )
108 username = QString::fromLocal8Bit( pw->pw_name );
109 if ( username.isEmpty() ) {
110#if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(5, 10, 0)
111 username = QString::fromLocal8Bit( qgetenv( "USER" ) );
112#else
113 username = qEnvironmentVariable( "USER" );
114#endif
115 }
116 return username;
117#endif
118}
119
120void SingleApplicationPrivate::genBlockServerName()
121{
122 QCryptographicHash appData( QCryptographicHash::Sha256 );
123 appData.addData( "SingleApplication", 17 );
124 appData.addData( SingleApplication::app_t::applicationName().toUtf8() );
125 appData.addData( SingleApplication::app_t::organizationName().toUtf8() );
126 appData.addData( SingleApplication::app_t::organizationDomain().toUtf8() );
127
128 if( ! (options & SingleApplication::Mode::ExcludeAppVersion) ) {
129 appData.addData( SingleApplication::app_t::applicationVersion().toUtf8() );
130 }
131
132 if( ! (options & SingleApplication::Mode::ExcludeAppPath) ) {
133#ifdef Q_OS_WIN
134 appData.addData( SingleApplication::app_t::applicationFilePath().toLower().toUtf8() );
135#else
136 appData.addData( SingleApplication::app_t::applicationFilePath().toUtf8() );
137#endif
138 }
139
140 // User level block requires a user specific data in the hash
141 if( options & SingleApplication::Mode::User ) {
142 appData.addData( getUsername().toUtf8() );
143 }
144
145 // Replace the backslash in RFC 2045 Base64 [a-zA-Z0-9+/=] to comply with
146 // server naming requirements.
147 blockServerName = appData.result().toBase64().replace("/", "_");
148}
149
150void SingleApplicationPrivate::initializeMemoryBlock()
151{
152 auto *inst = static_cast<InstancesInfo*>( memory->data() );
153 inst->primary = false;
154 inst->secondary = 0;
155 inst->primaryPid = -1;
156 inst->primaryUser[0] = '\0';
157 inst->checksum = blockChecksum();
158}
159
160void SingleApplicationPrivate::startPrimary()
161{
162 Q_Q(SingleApplication);
163
164 // Successful creation means that no main process exists
165 // So we start a QLocalServer to listen for connections
166 QLocalServer::removeServer( blockServerName );
167 server = new QLocalServer();
168
169 // Restrict access to the socket according to the
170 // SingleApplication::Mode::User flag on User level or no restrictions
171 if( options & SingleApplication::Mode::User ) {
172 server->setSocketOptions( QLocalServer::UserAccessOption );
173 } else {
174 server->setSocketOptions( QLocalServer::WorldAccessOption );
175 }
176
177 server->listen( blockServerName );
178 QObject::connect(
179 server,
180 &QLocalServer::newConnection,
181 this,
182 &SingleApplicationPrivate::slotConnectionEstablished
183 );
184
185 // Reset the number of connections
186 auto *inst = static_cast <InstancesInfo*>( memory->data() );
187
188 inst->primary = true;
189 inst->primaryPid = q->applicationPid();
190 qstrncpy( inst->primaryUser, getUsername().toUtf8().data(), sizeof(inst->primaryUser) );
191 inst->checksum = blockChecksum();
192
193 instanceNumber = 0;
194}
195
196void SingleApplicationPrivate::startSecondary()
197{
198}
199
200void SingleApplicationPrivate::connectToPrimary( int msecs, ConnectionType connectionType )
201{
202 // Connect to the Local Server of the Primary Instance if not already
203 // connected.
204 if( socket == nullptr ) {
205 socket = new QLocalSocket();
206 }
207
208 // If already connected - we are done;
209 if( socket->state() == QLocalSocket::ConnectedState )
210 return;
211
212 // If not connect
213 if( socket->state() == QLocalSocket::UnconnectedState ||
214 socket->state() == QLocalSocket::ClosingState ) {
215 socket->connectToServer( blockServerName );
216 }
217
218 // Wait for being connected
219 if( socket->state() == QLocalSocket::ConnectingState ) {
220 socket->waitForConnected( msecs );
221 }
222
223 // Initialisation message according to the SingleApplication protocol
224 if( socket->state() == QLocalSocket::ConnectedState ) {
225 // Notify the parent that a new instance had been started;
226 QByteArray initMsg;
227 QDataStream writeStream(&initMsg, QIODevice::WriteOnly);
228
229#if (QT_VERSION >= QT_VERSION_CHECK(5, 6, 0))
230 writeStream.setVersion(QDataStream::Qt_5_6);
231#endif
232
233 writeStream << blockServerName.toLatin1();
234 writeStream << static_cast<quint8>(connectionType);
235 writeStream << instanceNumber;
236 quint16 checksum = qChecksum(initMsg.constData(), static_cast<quint32>(initMsg.length()));
237 writeStream << checksum;
238
239 // The header indicates the message length that follows
240 QByteArray header;
241 QDataStream headerStream(&header, QIODevice::WriteOnly);
242
243#if (QT_VERSION >= QT_VERSION_CHECK(5, 6, 0))
244 headerStream.setVersion(QDataStream::Qt_5_6);
245#endif
246 headerStream << static_cast <quint64>( initMsg.length() );
247
248 socket->write( header );
249 socket->write( initMsg );
250 socket->flush();
251 socket->waitForBytesWritten( msecs );
252 }
253}
254
255quint16 SingleApplicationPrivate::blockChecksum()
256{
257 return qChecksum(
258 static_cast <const char *>( memory->data() ),
259 offsetof( InstancesInfo, checksum )
260 );
261}
262
263qint64 SingleApplicationPrivate::primaryPid()
264{
265 qint64 pid;
266
267 memory->lock();
268 auto *inst = static_cast<InstancesInfo*>( memory->data() );
269 pid = inst->primaryPid;
270 memory->unlock();
271
272 return pid;
273}
274
275QString SingleApplicationPrivate::primaryUser()
276{
277 QByteArray username;
278
279 memory->lock();
280 auto *inst = static_cast<InstancesInfo*>( memory->data() );
281 username = inst->primaryUser;
282 memory->unlock();
283
284 return QString::fromUtf8( username );
285}
286
287/**
288 * @brief Executed when a connection has been made to the LocalServer
289 */
290void SingleApplicationPrivate::slotConnectionEstablished()
291{
292 QLocalSocket *nextConnSocket = server->nextPendingConnection();
293 connectionMap.insert(nextConnSocket, ConnectionInfo());
294
295 QObject::connect(nextConnSocket, &QLocalSocket::aboutToClose,
296 [nextConnSocket, this]() {
297 auto &info = connectionMap[nextConnSocket];
298 Q_EMIT this->slotClientConnectionClosed( nextConnSocket, info.instanceId );
299 }
300 );
301
302 QObject::connect(nextConnSocket, &QLocalSocket::disconnected,
303 [nextConnSocket, this](){
304 connectionMap.remove(nextConnSocket);
305 nextConnSocket->deleteLater();
306 }
307 );
308
309 QObject::connect(nextConnSocket, &QLocalSocket::readyRead,
310 [nextConnSocket, this]() {
311 auto &info = connectionMap[nextConnSocket];
312 switch(info.stage) {
313 case StageHeader:
314 readInitMessageHeader(nextConnSocket);
315 break;
316 case StageBody:
317 readInitMessageBody(nextConnSocket);
318 break;
319 case StageConnected:
320 Q_EMIT this->slotDataAvailable( nextConnSocket, info.instanceId );
321 break;
322 default:
323 break;
324 };
325 }
326 );
327}
328
329void SingleApplicationPrivate::readInitMessageHeader( QLocalSocket *sock )
330{
331 if (!connectionMap.contains( sock )) {
332 return;
333 }
334
335 if( sock->bytesAvailable() < ( qint64 )sizeof( quint64 ) ) {
336 return;
337 }
338
339 QDataStream headerStream( sock );
340
341#if (QT_VERSION >= QT_VERSION_CHECK(5, 6, 0))
342 headerStream.setVersion( QDataStream::Qt_5_6 );
343#endif
344
345 // Read the header to know the message length
346 quint64 msgLen = 0;
347 headerStream >> msgLen;
348 ConnectionInfo &info = connectionMap[sock];
349 info.stage = StageBody;
350 info.msgLen = msgLen;
351
352 if ( sock->bytesAvailable() >= (qint64) msgLen ) {
353 readInitMessageBody( sock );
354 }
355}
356
357void SingleApplicationPrivate::readInitMessageBody( QLocalSocket *sock )
358{
359 Q_Q(SingleApplication);
360
361 if (!connectionMap.contains( sock )) {
362 return;
363 }
364
365 ConnectionInfo &info = connectionMap[sock];
366 if( sock->bytesAvailable() < ( qint64 )info.msgLen ) {
367 return;
368 }
369
370 // Read the message body
371 QByteArray msgBytes = sock->read(info.msgLen);
372 QDataStream readStream(msgBytes);
373
374#if (QT_VERSION >= QT_VERSION_CHECK(5, 6, 0))
375 readStream.setVersion( QDataStream::Qt_5_6 );
376#endif
377
378 // server name
379 QByteArray latin1Name;
380 readStream >> latin1Name;
381
382 // connection type
383 ConnectionType connectionType = InvalidConnection;
384 quint8 connTypeVal = InvalidConnection;
385 readStream >> connTypeVal;
386 connectionType = static_cast <ConnectionType>( connTypeVal );
387
388 // instance id
389 quint32 instanceId = 0;
390 readStream >> instanceId;
391
392 // checksum
393 quint16 msgChecksum = 0;
394 readStream >> msgChecksum;
395
396 const quint16 actualChecksum = qChecksum( msgBytes.constData(), static_cast<quint32>( msgBytes.length() - sizeof( quint16 ) ) );
397
398 bool isValid = readStream.status() == QDataStream::Ok &&
399 QLatin1String(latin1Name) == blockServerName &&
400 msgChecksum == actualChecksum;
401
402 if( !isValid ) {
403 sock->close();
404 return;
405 }
406
407 info.instanceId = instanceId;
408 info.stage = StageConnected;
409
410 if( connectionType == NewInstance ||
411 ( connectionType == SecondaryInstance &&
412 options & SingleApplication::Mode::SecondaryNotification ) )
413 {
414 Q_EMIT q->instanceStarted();
415 }
416
417 if (sock->bytesAvailable() > 0) {
418 Q_EMIT this->slotDataAvailable( sock, instanceId );
419 }
420}
421
422void SingleApplicationPrivate::slotDataAvailable( QLocalSocket *dataSocket, quint32 instanceId )
423{
424 Q_Q(SingleApplication);
425 Q_EMIT q->receivedMessage( instanceId, dataSocket->readAll() );
426}
427
428void SingleApplicationPrivate::slotClientConnectionClosed( QLocalSocket *closedSocket, quint32 instanceId )
429{
430 if( closedSocket->bytesAvailable() > 0 )
431 Q_EMIT slotDataAvailable( closedSocket, instanceId );
432}
